Dear [Name],

We are pleased to extend our invitation to you on behalf of the North American Telugu Society (NATS) for the America Telugu Sambaralu being held at NJ Expo Center, Edison, NJ from May 26th to May 28th, 2023. NATS is one of the largest non-profit national organizations representing Telugu speaking people of North America. Our primary objective is to address the issues and concerns that affect the everyday lives of Telugu people living in North America. The biennial national conference, America Telugu Sambaralu, is a three-day event packed with a variety of activities including cultural programs, literary and spiritual activities, CME sessions, Zellenial (Next generation group) programs and activities, alumni meetings, health forums, Women’s forum, motivational speeches, and business seminars. The conference serves the purpose of providing a platform to exchange ideas, interact with each other, and celebrate a rich cultural heritage along with NATS basic principle of ‘SERVING THE COMMUNITY’.

We are glad to inform you that NATS is making arrangements to celebrate 100 years of Sri Ghantasala garu (May 26, 2023), 100 years of Sri Allu Ramalingaiah garu (May 27, 2023), and 100 years of Sri NTR garu (May 28, 2023) in a grand style. NATS takes pride in celebrating these legends who impacted the lives of Telugu people for several decades. As part of our endeavor to preserve and promote Telugu literary and culture, we have planned several literary sessions including Ragavadhanam. We would be honored to have you as our guest during our convention, and we look forward to hearing a positive reply from you.

Please feel free to contact us for any further information or queries. Thank you for your time and consideration.

Best regards,
[Your Name]
On behalf of North American Telugu Society (NATS)
